CONTACT_MENU.TEXT_SCHEDULES: Monday - Friday: 9:00 am - 5:00 pm Saturday: 10:00 am - 2:00 pm (City Time from Mexico)

HOME.MAIN_TITLE: 2020 gave us a break to appreciate the world, we are ready to rediscover it.
HOME.SECOND_HOT_TRIPS: Book your trip with the 10% initial deposit and use it for life.
HOME.TITLE_GENERAL: See the world through a local lens
HOME.SUBTITLE_HISTORIES: Over 1 million trips taken. Countless stories told.
HOME.CONTENT_US: Through the years we have discovered that our travelers not only discover incredible places around the world with a unique style, they also discover the possibility of living unique experiences with their travel companions who become friends for life. We live each trip as the first of our lives and we transmit the emotion of discovering incredible places as a group of friends.

TOURS.SORRY_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, we couldn't find any tours from
TOURS.BUT_SORRY_NOT_FOUND: Here are some suggestions we think you’ll love

HOTELS.NOT_DATA_YET: There is no data but we are going to show you nice places to go ...

FLIGHTS.LOADING_CURRENT: We keep looking for more options for you!

ERRORS.SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: No search results found, reload the page to give you better options
ERRORS.VALIDATE_DESCRIPTION: This option isn't available, please reload the page to give you  best options for this flight.

CREATE_RESERVATION.SIGNATURE_MSG: Add your signature in the next square:
CREATE_RESERVATION.LAST_STEP: You are one step away from booking
CREATE_RESERVATION.IMPORTANT_NOTES: Please enter the correct information and verify that it is the same as your official document.
CREATE_RESERVATION.TOOLTIP_DOCUMENT: If your tour is national: you must enter your INE or ID voter code. If your tour is international, you must put your passport number (if you don't have it yet, put your electro INE code) or ID.

DEPARTURES.OF_TOTAL: of the total of the tour
DEPARTURES.TEXT_IMPORTANT: Please take note of your trip start and end times below. We recommend to arrive in your start city at least 8 hrs before to make sure you do not miss the start of your trip. Extra nights of accommodation can be added before and/or after your trip for an additional cost during check-out.
DEPARTURES.COMMENT_ONE: For a limited time, reserve your place with only 10% initial deposit*
DEPARTURES.COMMENT_TWO: Date flexibility, request your change of date to this or another tour at no cost
DEPARTURES.COMMENT_THREE: Deposit for life, use your deposit as a credit for any other trip in case of cancellation
DEPARTURES.COMMENT_FOUR: All taxes and tips are included, no hidden charges

BLOG_ONE.TITLE: Join a travel group and discover incredible places in the world
BLOG_ONE.CONTENT: We create authentic travel experiences for young people aged 18 to 40 traveling in a group, the atmosphere is unique, the travel style is incredible, the experiences are unforgettable ...

BLOG_TWO.TITLE: Book with confidence
BLOG_TWO.CONTENT: We know that in time of COVID_19 there is uncertainty in the plans, we want to give you the peace of mind that your initial deposit and payments can always be used even when you change plans. Learn about our flexibility policy.

BLOCK_ONE.TITLE: Simple
BLOCK_ONE.DESCRIPTION: Discover the world with us and put your fears aside, you will see how easy it is to travel with us.

BLOCK_TWO.TITLE: Travel friends
BLOCK_TWO.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy together every day with travelers aged 18 to 40 who will become your adventure friends

BLOCK_THREE.TITLE: Unique places
BLOCK_THREE.DESCRIPTION: In each of our trips you will discover special corners that we will show you like no one else.

BUY_CONTENT.CONTENT_ONE: For a limited time, reserve your place with only 10% initial deposit
BUY_CONTENT.CONTENT_TWO: Can't travel? No problem, use your deposit for another trip or transfer it to a friend.
BUY_CONTENT.CONTENT_THREE: Change of plans? Change the dates of your trip or even the route of your trip at no cost
BUY_CONTENT.CONTENT_FOUR: You can settle the total payment of your trip up to 30 days before the departure date.

LINKING.TITLE: Account linking error
LINKING.TEXT: An error occurred in the linking process, please try again later. If the problem persists contact us.

REFERRED_PAGE.TITLE: Referral program
REFERRED_PAGE.SUB_TITLE: Start making money with Backpackers by inviting your friends. The more referrals you get, the more money you accumulate to be able to travel to amazing places.
REFERRED_PAGE.BLOCK_1: Spread the word by sharing your link on social media, blog, etc.
REFERRED_PAGE.BLOCK_2_1_1: When your friend signs up they will get
REFERRED_PAGE.BLOCK_2_1_2: in your purse for your next trip with Mochileros.com.mx
REFERRED_PAGE.BLOCK_3_1_1: When they make their first reservation, you will get
REFERRED_PAGE.BLOCK_3_1_2: in your purse to use on your next trip.
